product_name: Icebreaker Oasis Half-Zip Long Underwear Top - Women's
long_description: With soft merino wool and a half-zipper that makes it easy to control your comfort, the women's Icebreaker Oasis half-zip long underwear top is well suited to stop-and-go activities in cool weather. Soft, nonirritating merino wool offers lightweight warmth next to skin and resists odors naturally. Lightweight merino wool wicks away moisture, dries quickly and breathes well to regulate temperature for outstanding warmth in cool weather. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Flatlock seams reduce chafing, and offset shoulder seams will not rub under backpack straps. Machine washable; line dry or dry flat in shade. The women's Icebreaker Oasis half-zip long underwear top has a slim fit.
short_description: With soft merino wool and a half-zipper that makes it easy to control your comfort, the women's Icebreaker Oasis half-zip long underwear top is well suited to stop-and-go activities in cool weather.
